metadata.title: CVE-2018-12291 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The on_get_missing_events function in handlers/federation.py in MatrixSynapse before 0.31.1 has a security bug in the get_missing_eventsfederation API where event visibility rules were not applied correctly.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12291` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

matrix-synapse - 1.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: matrix-synapse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.0-1').
